body.name: Angel Soft® Toilet Paper, 2-Ply Bath Tissue, 9 Rolls (pack of 4)
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
features: ANGEL SOFT toilet paper delivers softness and strength at a good value
Long lasting rolls with 425 plus 2-ply sheets per roll
Quality toilet paper for the whole family at a price that won’t break the bank
Flushable and safe for standard septic and sewer systems
Includes 36 mega rolls of classic white toilet paper
body.description: AN IDEAL BALANCE OF SOFTNESS AND STRENGTH. ANGEL SOFT Toilet Paper reliably delivers the quality you want at a value you love. Each mega roll has 425plus 2-ply sheets designed to fit in most bathroom toilet paper holders. Because each mega roll includes 4x the sheets of a standard ANGEL SOFT regular size roll, you won’t have to change the roll as often. ANGEL SOFT septic safe toilet tissue is safe for use in standard sewer and septic systems, meaning that it will break down easily after flushing for hassle-free use. ANGEL SOFT Toilet Paper is certified to the Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI) sourcing standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: You don’t have to choose between a soft toilet paper and a strong one—Angel Soft is the perfect balance of both. Our Mega Rolls are four times as big as our Regular Rolls, so you can change the roll less often! Angel Soft breaks down easily after flushing and is safe for standard sewer and septic systems. Angel Soft Toilet Paper is certified to the Sustainable Forestry Initiative (SFI) sourcing standards.
Angel Soft Angel Soft with Fresh Lavender Angel Soft with Fresh Linen Angel Soft Ultra Delivers Softness & Strength ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 2-Ply ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Septic & Sewer Safe ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Scented Tube - ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars will fit my tp storage container
reviews.reviewText: I've had a nice Toilet paper storage tube for years; but when the "Extra Large" rolls of TP came out, they were always too big to fit this storage unit in my small bathroom. The large rolls got stuck in my unit. I'm very glad to finally find this slightly narrower roll of TP that now fits in my storage unit and slides out easily.These rolls also fit the dispenser roll without any crowding.The paper is good quality, soft and absorbent and not too expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's toilet paper, it does its job and does it well..........don't know what else to say??!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best buy I can find on Amazon
reviews.reviewText: Cheap, soft, comes in convenient 36-roll boxes (about as big as I can handle at once and buying 36 rolls at once means paying a low $0.19/sheet). Rolls are slightly inconsistent in appearance, shape and size, but I don't care, I'm wiping my butt with them not showing them off to a date. My major complaint is they are not available on Amazon Subscribe and Save! I spent about 30 minutes today searching Amazon for a comparable Subscribe and Save product and couldn't find one. Although it seems ridiculous that a toilet paper! product is not subscribable, I'm going to keep buying this item every month as I could find no comparable quality at the same price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars toilet paper is toilet paper
reviews.reviewText: What can i say about toilet paper. It is more convenient than leaves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Even though Angel Soft® clearly changed their product, it will suffice
reviews.reviewText: We've been Angel Soft® customers for many years, usually buying from our local grocery store.but about two years ago, we noticed that the product had definitely changed...it was no longer soft, it was now almost sandy, for lack of a better word.At first, I thought our household was mistaken thinking that the product had changed without any warning, but then I started seeing a lot of complaints on the Internet...other customers had noticed the sudden difference as well.So during the end of 2018 through 2019 we decided to try other brands and continued to do so into 2020, but then the pandemic hit and we were lucky to find 'any' TP....anywhere!, so we were just getting what we could find about once a month, no hoarding...at our local grocery stores, Amazon, and other online resources until retailers were able to catch up with the demand...no, not demand...more like PANIC...I'll never understand the whole hoarding thing....it proved to me that 'we're NOT all in this together'There are a couple of other brands that we actually like a little better than the current Angel Soft®, but given the larger packs for a reasonable price here on Amazon, we decided to go back to Angel Soft® because, although it isn't as soft as it used to be, it's not too thick for sewer systems like some 3-ply brands are, nor is it too linty, and the larger sized rolls means fewer empty roll changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Babies bringing you tp!
reviews.reviewText: I always found it funny that the logo for this product is a baby cherub bringing you toilet paper. Nobody seems to think "ya know, that's kinda weird"... nope, we all just go with it, but apparently this toilet paper is a gift from Heaven.It is soft... but is it angel soft?I don't know, are angels soft?These thought experiments vex me so.Well whatever... it's at a fair price and is pretty good... a whole lot better then the plastic sandpaper we all had in public schools growing up. I don't know where you can even buy tp that bad, but they somehow found it didn't they?ANGEL SOFT! It is good toilet paper, and... that's... just... great...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, standard toilet paper.
reviews.reviewText: Overall great value for the price. Not sure what other reviews were saying regarding the thickness and absorbency of the product.... what do you want, a towel? It's standard toilet paper. I'm not overly picky with toilet paper but am definitely not a fan of the thin varieties found in hospitals or schools. This brand in my opinion falls right in the middle between the thin, hospital type and Charmin. I feel like I used one roll maybe every two weeks or so (only one person, female, doesn't use 20 squares of TP every time using the washroom, but uses washroom maybe 5 times a day?) Doesn't rip easily and has a pretty good absorbency. I would definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best for the septic system
reviews.reviewText: Having had the lift station from the added on bathroom fail once, with a HUGE mess in the crawl space, it was caused by toilet paper catching on the float control, finally heavy enough to keep it down and it would not activate the pump. I personally, on hands and knees with fishing waders, a sponge mop and 5 gallon buckets had to clean it up.I used Consumers Report to get the BEST rated paper for disintegration in the system So far so good, been a couple years.

Very large rolls, and great deal for your money. This toilet paper is thick, huge amount on each roll, but definitely not soft. It does a great job, doesn't fall apart at all. Great quality toilet paper, to bad it isn't soft!

reviews.reviewTitle: Poor quality, not worth the money
reviews.reviewText: This paper flakes, crumbed and falls apart during use, very flimsy structure. Better to buy Ultra Strong paper.
Not soft at all, very thin very rough! Will NOT buy again
